SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.utils

Class CsvToBoardParser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.utils.CsvToBoardParser
public class CsvToBoardParser extends Object
This class contains utility methods for parsing csv files describing what are defined as
  • board cell type configuration: the csv contains the type of each cell in the board
  • board object card configuration: the csv contains the Object cards in the board
Author:
Luca Guffanti

  • Method Details

    • parseBoardCellTypeConfiguration

      public static BoardCell[][] parseBoardCellTypeConfiguration(String path, int nPlayers)
      This method builds a board matrix starting from a configuration where each cell is associated to its type
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the csv file
      nPlayers - the number of players
      Returns:
      the matrix where cells are initialized with their correct type
      See Also:
      • BoardCellEnum

    • parseBoardObjectCardConfiguration

      public static BoardCell[][] parseBoardObjectCardConfiguration(String pathType, String pathObject, int nPlayers)
      This method builds a board matrix starting from a configuration where each cell is associated to an objectCard
      Parameters:
      pathType - the path to the csv file which contains type configuration
      pathObject - the path to the csv file which contains object cards configuration
      nPlayers - the number of players
      Returns:
      the matrix representing the board containing object cards
      See Also:
      • ObjectCard
